- fixes a bug in the chat where the text entry box would sometimes display in the wrong position
- various bug fixes and improvements

- fixes a bug in the chat where the text entry box would sometimes display in the wrong position
- various bug fixes and improvements

In this update we have made a number of improvements as well as some welcome bug fixes. 
- a redesign of the live broadcast lists showcasing your broadcast artwork images more prominently while browsing 
- it is now possible to block users from within the app
- we have added a broadcasting menu which contains a direct link to your showreel as well as broadcasting help pages 
- we have redesigned the showreel to break up published and unpublished broadcasts into two separate sections 
- we have also added an "Audiobus" button which allows connection with Audiobus to Mixlr in order to broadcast sounds from other music/audio apps

- a redesign of the live broadcast lists showcasing your broadcast artwork images more prominently while browsing 
- it is now possible to block users from within the app
- we have added a broadcasting menu which contains a direct link to your showreel as well as broadcasting help pages 
- we have redesigned the showreel to break up published and unpublished broadcasts into two separate sections 
- we have also added an "Audiobus" button which allows connection with Audiobus to Mixlr in order to broadcast sounds from other music/audio apps

- New "Listen" navigation. It's now much easier to navigate what's live on Mixlr.
- We've completely redesigned how live broadcasts are displayed in the "Listen" section 
- General improvements and bug fixes

bug and crash fixes
This version contains important crash fixes and is recommended for all users.
This version contains important crash fixes and is recommended for all users.

Thanks to all our community who have sent us their feedback and bug reports over the last few months.

We've been working hard to fix as many issues as possible, and are happy to release a new update of the Mixlr iOS app!

Here are the main changes:

* Numerous crashes and other bugs FIXED.
* Updated Audiobus SDK
* Tapping on a crowd member no longer shows "null" in overlay
* Fixed issues where it was not possible to upload a profile or artwork image
* Now playing bar no longer disappears after loading a new category page
* Use current location button in edit profile settings is fixed

Happy listening and broadcasting!

Thanks to all our community who have sent us their feedback and bug reports over the last few months.

We've been working hard to fix as many issues as possible, and are happy to release a new update of the Mixlr iOS app!

Here are the main changes:

* Numerous crashes and other bugs FIXED.
* Updated Audiobus SDK
* Tapping on a crowd member no longer shows "null" in overlay
* Fixed issues where it was not possible to upload a profile or artwork image
* Now playing bar no longer disappears after loading a new category page
* Use current location button in edit profile settings is fixed

Happy listening and broadcasting!

This update includes stability and bug fixes for the following:
* Audiobus broadcasting
* Showreel playback for off-air users

Changelog:
• Refreshed interface, now supporting all current iPhone and iPad screens.
• Improved broadcasting quality on iPhone XR/11/Pro.
• Added crowdfunding Support button, which Broadcasters can enable via website settings.
• Fixed bug in Chat where some messages were clipped.
• Fixed or removed broken links.
• Fixed intermittent bug when accessing your showreel.
• Removed Audiobus support.
• Removed Facebook Login. You can migrate your account to a Mixlr account in the app
• Removed "Find Friends" feature.

Psst! Broadcasters can follow the trail and signup for early access to our brand new App
